reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one mentioning it wraps around the waist twice, and appreciate its style and comfort.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice fit and quality
items.body: Very nice dress made well from good quality material. True to size. My only problem was that it was a little too long but I am 5‚Äô1‚Äù so that is to be expected. It was very comfortable and not clingy. Good value. Read more
items.author: D. Logan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: My favorite dress. Comfy and classy. Fits well. Read more
items.author: Mommerz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: True to size. Comfortable fit Read more
items.author: deana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty in Pink üéÄ
items.body: ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è I absolutely love this dress! The soft pink color is so lovely in person, and the material is both stretchy and comfortable while still not being see-through. I was pleasantly surprised at how soft the fabric feels against the skin. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô3‚Äù and the length was perfect on me‚Äînot too long and not too short. It‚Äôs such a beautiful casual dress that looks and feels amazing to wear. Definitely a 5-star purchase! Read more
items.author: Wendy Darling

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: Very good fit. Could have sized down one size. It was beautiful for the wedding. Can dress up or down. Read more
items.author: Lillian Conroe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!!!
items.body: This dress is true to size, very comfortable. Perfect material, not too thick, not too thin. Can be dressed up or casual. I love it Read more
items.author: F Robinson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color in photos not accurate; fit and length are ok
items.body: Color of the dress in photo is not accurate. Color is not an emerald green as shown, but more of an army green which I do not like. Dress also arrived with a hole in the right pocket. Fit is ok. Dress is a maxi; I am 5ft 2in and dress reaches a tiny bit lower than the back of my foot; with heels the length should be fine. But again, the color is NOT a deep green as shown in the photos but a much lighter shade of green. Read more
items.author: TheSinger47

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good buy
items.body: I purchased a size up due to some of the reviews and it‚Äôs just right. If you want it super clingy, order your size or go down a size. It has some stretch to it. The seams are okay after washing (it didn‚Äôt have a smell right out of the package but I always wash new garments before wearing. The length wasn‚Äôt too bad (I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5). I didn‚Äôt get to wear it to the event I purchased it for, but it‚Äôs a keeper. Read more
items.author: Nancy Perry

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, B1-dark Green, Black Gold, Black Sakura, A2-royal Blue, Striped Red Blcak, White Afican Print, C2-blue Purple, B2-wine Red, A4-dark Purple, Color Afican Print, D2-solid-deeppink, Light Pink, Z1-light Green 3/4. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
